content.text:
# 3rd Critics' Choice Real TV Awards

| location       =
| country        = United States
| website        =
| network        =
| runtime        =
| previous       = 2nd
| main           = Critics' Choice Real TV Awards
| next           = 4th
}}
The '''3rd Critics' Choice Real TV Awards, presented by the Broadcast Television Journalists Association and NPACT, which recognizes excellence in nonfiction, unscripted and reality programming across broadcast, cable and streaming platforms, were held on June 21, 2021. The nominations were announced on June 2, 2021.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first and highlighted in bold:
Programs
{|class=wikitable
|-
!style="width:50%"| Best Competition Series
!style="width:50%"| Best Competition Series: Talent/Variety
|-
|valign="top" |
*The Great British Baking Show (Netflix) (tie)
*''RuPaul's Drag Race (VH1) (tie)'
**The Amazing Race (CBS)
**Top Chef (Bravo)
**Tough as Nails (CBS)
|valign="top"|
*'The Masked Singer (Fox) (tie)
*The Voice (NBC) (tie)'
**American Idol (ABC)
**Legendary (HBO Max)
**World of Dance (NBC)
|-
!style="width:50%"| Best Unstructured Series
!style="width:50%"| Best Structured Series
|-
|valign="top"|
*'Deaf U (Netflix)'
**''Crikey! It's the Irwins (Discovery+)
**Lenox Hill (Netflix)
**The Real World Homecoming: New York (Paramount+)
**RuPaul's Drag Race: Untucked (VH1)
|valign="top"|
*'Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives (Food Network) (tie)
*The Oprah Conversation (Apple TV+) (tie)'
**A World of Calm (HBO Max)
**History of Swear Words (Netflix)
**Queer Eye (Netflix)
|-

!style="width:50%"| Sports Show
|-
|valign="top"|
*'Shark Tank (ABC)'
**Restaurant: Impossible (Food Network)
**Streets of Dreams with Marcus Lemonis (CNBC)
**Undercover Billionaire (Discovery Channel)
**Wahl Street (HBO Max)
|valign="top"|
*'30 for 30 (ESPN)'
**Defying Gravity (YouTube Originals)
**Last Chance U: Basketball (Netflix)
**Peyton's Places (ESPN+)
**Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel (HBO)
|-
!style="width:50%"| Best Crime/Justice Series
!style="width:50%"| Best Ongoing Documentary Series
|-
|valign="top"|
*'''I'll Be Gone in the Dark (HBO)'
**Murder Among the Mormons (Netflix)
**Murder on Middle Beach (HBO)
**The Ripper (Netflix)
**The Vow (HBO)
**Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller (National Geographic)
|valign="top"|
*'Frontline (PBS)'
**American Masters (PBS)
**Dear... (Apple TV+)
**POV (PBS)
**The Circus: Inside the Greatest Political Show on Earth (Showtime)
**The Vow (HBO)
|-
!style="width:50%"| Best Limited Documentary Series

|-
|valign="top"|
*'1971: The Year That Music Changed Everything (Apple TV+)'
**Amend: The Fight for America (Netflix)
**''I'll Be Gone in the Dark (HBO)
**Love Fraud (Showtime)
**Murder on Middle Beach (HBO)
**Secrets of the Whales (Disney+/National Geographic)
|valign="top"|
*'Issa Rae Teaches Creating Outside the Lines (MasterClass)'
**First Person (Snapchat)
**Lady Parts (ellentube)
**OWN Your Vote (NowThis/OWN)

|valign="top"|
